content.rendered:
Influence the Influencers

H2STS Drug Prevention

Social Media Contest

Who

Who will participate?

— Youth of Henrico

Who will judge?

— Representatives of partnering youth clubs and organizations including HTS2S Youth Task Force and Youth Ambassadors

What

● The contest?

— A competition of videos to receive the most likes

● The content?

— The content must be youth substance use prevention strategies, the promotion of a protective factor, the promotion of mental health, and/or the promotion of overall health and wellness

● The substances that may be featured

— Nicotine/E-Cigarettes/Vaping/Tobacco; Alcohol; Marijuana/THC; Opioids/ Prescription Drugs

● The length of the videos

— 2 minutes or less

● The prizes

■ First Place - Choice of $1,000 Educational/Vocational Scholarship OR $750 technology purchase
■ Second Place - Choice of $500 Educational/Vocational Scholarship OR $375 technology purchase
■ Third Place - Choice of $250 Educational/Vocational Scholarship OR $200 technology purchase
■ Best Nicotine Prevention Video - Choice of $400 scholarship OR $400 technology purchase

When

2/17/2023

Contest Announcement Date

2/27/23

Registration starts

5/20/2023

Registration deadline

6/6/2023

Entries are posted to the
HTS2S Instagram page

6/8/2023

Deciding the winner

6/10/2023

Watch Party / Awards Ceremony

11 a.m. at The Oak, 15 S. Oak Ave, Highland Springs, VA 23075

Why

To promote youth substance use prevention, protective factors, mental health, and overall health and wells

To promote healthy use of social media

To encourage the development of technology skills

How

● Review the Rules and Tips
● Review the Example Videos
● Make submissions for contest via Google Form and/or Email
● Judges approve videos to be posted
● Judges decide superlative and select winner

EXAMPLE VIDEOS

Vaping is good for You

Not2Vape.org

OTC Safety

How long will Big Tobacco target Me

Teens Care Too

HTS2S Youth Task Force Anti-Marijuana

HTS2S Introduction

Chesterfield Safe

Ready to get started?

Complete this form and submit your application

Fill the form

OR

Send an email to henricotoosmart2start@gmail.com with “Influence the Influencers Contest” as the Subject
